resources.string: Match & Mix is a unique memory-puzzle game that combines number matching with tile sliding. Your goal is to find matching number pairs while strategically moving tiles to create opportunities for matches.

• Each tile contains 5 numbers arranged in a cross pattern
• One space is always empty, allowing tiles to be moved
• Numbers can only be matched when they are revealed
• You have 3 chances and limited time to make matches

1. Click on numbers to reveal them
2. You can reveal up to 2 numbers at a time
3. If the numbers match, they turn green and stay revealed
4. If they don't match, they will be hidden again
5. Slide tiles into the empty space to create new matching opportunities
6. Match all pairs before time runs out to win!

• Each correct match: +10 points
• Quick matches (under 5 seconds): +5 bonus points
• Wrong matches: -2 points
• Running out of chances: Game Over

• Plan your moves carefully
• Remember the numbers you've seen
• Use the empty space strategically
• Try to make matches quickly for bonus points
• Keep track of your remaining chances
